CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 17, 1959, pg. A3 reads:"Last Rites for Kappa Alpha Psi Founder - Funeral services were held for Dr. Marcus P. Blakemore, one of the 10 founders of Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity, from Ebenezer Baptist Church on Tuesday. He had practiced dentistry here for 35 years.  Death came on Oct. 8 in Pittsburgh Veterans Administration Hospital...In the upper left photo, the bereaved widow, Mrs. Azalea Blakemore, on the arm of her nephew, Dr. William P. Watson, leaves the church... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Widow Azalea Blakemore, center, being escorted by nephew Dr. William P. Watson through doorway at Ebenezer Baptist Church for Dr. Marcus P. Blakemore funeral
